<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	/* Dialog de agregado de transacción */
	var transModal = $("#transaction").dialog({
		autoOpen: false,
		modal: true,
		minWidth: 600,
		closeOnEscape: false,
		title: "Transacción",
		buttons: [
			{
				text: "Cancelar",
				class: "",
				click: function(){
					$("#trans-form")[0].reset();
					$(".add_sub").empty();
					$(".add_sub").append("Agregar");
					console.log($(this).data("submitUrl"));
					transModal.dialog("close");
				}
			},
			{
				text: "Guardar",
				class: "save",
				click: function(){
					submitUrl = $(this).data("submitUrl");
					$.ajax({
						type: "POST",
						url: submitUrl,
						data: $("#trans-form").serialize(),
						success: function(response) {
							console.log(response);
							sQty = jQuery.parseJSON(response).qty;
							$("#validate-form").find("input[name='qty']").val(sQty);
							$("#trans-form")[0].reset();
							transModal.dialog("close");
							window.dTables.fnReloadAjax();
						},
						error: function() {
							alert("Error");
						}
					});
				}
			}
		]
	});

	$("body").delegate(".adjustClick","click", function(e){
		e.preventDefault();

		updTypes = $("select[name='id_sto_stock_update_types']");

		if(!$(this).hasClass("button")) {
			updTypes.parent().parent().parent().removeClass("hidden");
			updTypes.empty();
			updTypes.append(
				'<option value="1" selected="selected">Agregar</option>' +
				'<option value="2">Ajustar</option>'
			);
			stockUpdatesId = $(this).attr("href").split("/").pop();
			$.ajax({
				type:"POST",
				url: "stock/ajx_stock_updates_get/" + stockUpdatesId,
				data: "",
				success: function(response){
					formData = JSON.parse(response);
					console.log(formData);
					$("#trans-form").find("input[name='lot_number']").val(formData.lot_number);
					$("#trans-form").find("input[name='description']").val(formData.description);
					$("#trans-form").find("input[name='date_added']").val(formData.date_added);
					$("#trans-form").find("input[name='expiration_date']").val(formData.expiration_date);
					$("#trans-form").find("input[name='id_sto_stock_updates']").val(stockUpdatesId);
				},
				error: function(){
					console.log("error");
				}
			});
		} else {
			updTypes.empty();
			updTypes.append(
				'<option value="0" selected="selected">Add</option>'
			);
			$("#trans-form").find("input[name='id_sto_stock_updates']").val("");
			updTypes.parent().parent().parent().addClass("hidden");
		}
		transModal.data("submitUrl",$(this).attr("href")).dialog("open");
	});

	$("select[name='id_sto_stock_update_types']").change(function(){
		if($(this).val()<2) {
			$(".add_sub").empty();
			$(".add_sub").append("Agregar");
		} else {
			$(".add_sub").empty();
			$(".add_sub").append("Remover");
		}
	});

</script>


<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	$("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").click(function(e){
	// $("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").closest("form").submit(function(e){
		$("#loading").css("display","");
		$("#loading").dialog("open");
		e.preventDefault();
		button = $(this);
		button.attr("disabled", "disabled");
		button.closest("form").submit();
		setTimeout(function(){
			button.removeAttr("disabled");
			$("#loading").dialog("close");
		},6000);
	});

	$(document).delegate(":input:not(textarea):not([type=submit])","keypress",function(e) {
		return e.keyCode != 13;
	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"> 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("#boton_dbug").click(function(){
            $.post("reception/work_order/listing", {dbug: "True"})
            window.location.replace("auth/login");
	});
	
	$("#loading").dialog({
		resizable: false,
		draggable: true,
		autoOpen: false,
		modal: true,
		height: 60,
		maxWidth: 180,
		closeOnEscape: true,
		title: "Procesando...",
		closeText: "hide",
		dialogClass: "no-close"
	  });

});


</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
	$().ready(function() {
		"use strict";

		App.init();
        
		var v = $("#create-user-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset").click(function() { v.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("User was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v2 = $("#write-message-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset2").click(function() { v2.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Message was not sent.", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v3 = $("#create-folder-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset3").click(function() { v3.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Folder was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v4 = $("#create-title-form").validate();


		$("#modal").click(function(e) {
                  $("#"+$(e.target).attr("modal")).modal({
                    opacity:50,
                    overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                    });
                });


		/*
		 * Charts
		 */
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'line', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-line').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'area', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-area').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'pie', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-pie').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'bar', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-bar').trigger('visualizeRefresh');

		/*
		 * Tabs
		 */
		$("#specify-a-unique-tab-name").createTabs();
		$("#tab-graph").createTabs();

		/*
		 * Contact List
		 */
		$('#slider').sliderNav();


                //## js_docready functions
                
				$.fn.dataTableExt.oApi.fnReloadAjax = function ( oSettings, sNewSource, fnCallback, bStandingRedraw )
				{
					// DataTables 1.10 compatibility - if 1.10 then versionCheck exists.
					// 1.10s API has ajax reloading built in, so we use those abilities
					// directly.
					if ( $.fn.dataTable.versionCheck ) {
						var api = new $.fn.dataTable.Api( oSettings );
				 
						if ( sNewSource ) {
							api.ajax.url( sNewSource ).load( fnCallback, !bStandingRedraw );
						}
						else {
							api.ajax.reload( fnCallback, !bStandingRedraw );
						}
						return;
					}
				 
					if ( sNewSource !== undefined && sNewSource !== null ) {
						oSettings.sAjaxSource = sNewSource;
					}
				 
					// Server-side processing should just call fnDraw
					if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bServerSide ) {
						this.fnDraw();
						return;
					}
				 
					this.oApi._fnProcessingDisplay( oSettings, true );
					var that = this;
					var iStart = oSettings._iDisplayStart;
					var aData = [];
				 
					this.oApi._fnServerParams( oSettings, aData );
				 
					oSettings.fnServerData.call( oSettings.oInstance, oSettings.sAjaxSource, aData, function(json) {
						/* Clear the old information from the table */
						that.oApi._fnClearTable( oSettings );
				 
						/* Got the data - add it to the table */
						var aData =  (oSettings.sAjaxDataProp !== '') ?
							that.oApi._fnGetObjectDataFn( oSettings.sAjaxDataProp )( json ) : json;
				 
						for ( var i=0 ; i<aData.length ; i++ )
						{
							that.oApi._fnAddData( oSettings, aData[i] );
						}
						 
						oSettings.aiDisplay = oSettings.aiDisplayMaster.slice();
				 
						that.fnDraw();
				 
						if ( bStandingRedraw === true )
						{
							oSettings._iDisplayStart = iStart;
							that.oApi._fnCalculateEnd( oSettings );
							that.fnDraw( false );
						}
				 
						that.oApi._fnProcessingDisplay( oSettings, false );
				 
						/* Callback user function - for event handlers etc */
						if ( typeof fnCallback == 'function' && fnCallback !== null )
						{
							fnCallback( oSettings );
						}
					}, oSettings );
				};
		
	var dates = $( ".datepicker" ).datepicker({
		dateFormat: "dd/mm/yy",
		changeMonth: true,
		firstDay: 1,
		changeYear: true,
		numberOfMonths: 1,
				defaultDate: 0,

		dayNamesMin: ["Do", "Lu", "Ma", "Mi", "Ju", "Vi", "Sa"],
		monthNames: ["Enero", "Febrero", "Marzo", "Abril", "Mayo",
		"Junio", "Julio", "Agosto", "Septiembre",
		"Octubre", "Noviembre", "Diciembre"],
		monthNamesShort: ["Ene", "Feb", "Mar", "Abr",
		"May", "Jun", "Jul", "Ago",
		"Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dic"]
	});


		/*
		 * DataTables
		 */
		//$('#table-accounts').dataTable();


		window.dTables = $('#table-list').dataTable({
		    "bProcessing": true,
		    "bServerSide": true,
		    "sAjaxSource": "stock/ajx_stock_updates_list/",
		    "sServerMethod": "POST",
		    "sPaginationType": "full_numbers",
		    "bJQueryUI": false,
		    "sDom": '<"top"lf<"clear">>rt<"block-actions"ip>',
		    "aaSorting": [[0,"desc"]],// Columna 4 con sort DESC
			"bAutoWidth": false,
		    "oLanguage": {
			"sProcessing":   "Procesando...",
			//"sLengthMenu":   "Mostrar _MENU_ registros",
			"sLengthMenu": 'Display <select class="data_table_list">'+
			             '<option value="10">10</option>'+
			             '<option value="20">20</option>'+
			             '<option value="30">30</option>'+
			             '<option value="40">40</option>'+
			             '<option value="50">50</option>'+
			             '<option value="-1">All</option>'+
			             '</select> records',
			"sZeroRecords":  "No se encontraron resultados",
			"sInfo":         " _START_ hasta _END_ de _TOTAL_ registros",
			"sInfoEmpty":    "0 hasta 0 de 0 registros",
			"sInfoFiltered": "(_MAX_ registros en total)",
			"sInfoPostFix":  "",
			"sSearch":       "Buscar:",
			"sUrl":          "",
			"oPaginate": {
			    "sFirst":    "Primero",
			    "sPrevious": "Anterior",
			    "sNext":     "Siguiente",
			    "sLast":     "Último"
			}
		    },
		    "aoColumns": [
			{ "bVisible": false, "bSearchable": false, },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "bVisible": false, "bSearchable": false, },{ "sClass": "row_table_center", "bSearchable": false, "bSortable": false }
			],
			
		});

	});
  </script>
  <!-- end scripts-->

* dentro del apartado fonts.googleapis.com se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=PT+Sans
* dentro del apartado fonts.gstatic.com se encuentra la carpeta s/ptsans/v17, y dentro de ésta carpeta se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v17/jizaRExUiTo99u79D0KExQ.woff2

La siguiente opción es: Listado de Insumos (Link:https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/stock/listing) y me arroja los siguientes apartados en Sources:
top, dentro de top se encuentra: app24.medicati.com, fonts.googleapis.com y fonts.gstatic.com.
* dentro del apartado app24.medicati.com se encuentra la carpeta mdti/lab, y dentro de esta carpeta se encuentran las carpetas: account_data/sanrafael/system, css, img, js y sanrafael/stock.
- dentro de la subcarpeta account_data/sanrafael/system se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/account_data/sanrafael/system/logo_sanrafael_260x98.png
- dentro de la subcarpeta css se encuentra la carpeta fonts y los siguientes archivos:
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/960.fluid.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/application_custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/buttons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/font-awesome.min.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/forms.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/icons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/jquery-ui-1.8.15.custom.css

		- https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/js/mylibs/jquery.dataTables-1.9.0.min.js

		- https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/js/mylibs/jquery.validate.js

- dentro de la subcarpeta sanrafael/stock se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/stock/listing
Te comparto el HTML:

                        <script defer src="../js/mylibs/jquery.dataTables-1.9.0.min.js"></script>
<div id="dialog" title="Confirmación" style="text-align:center;display:none;"><br>Seguro que desea borrar el Insumo</div> 
<div class="grid_12">
	<div class="block-border">
		<div class="block-header">
			<h1>Listado de Insumos</h1><a class='button' style='margin-top:5px; margin-left:20px;' href="https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/stock/insert">Nuevo Insumo</a>
			<span></span>
			<a class='button' id='empty' style='margin-top:5px; margin-right:10px;float:right;background:#6b352b;' href="https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/stock/listing/empty">Agotado (70)</a>
			<a class='button' id='empty' style='margin-top:5px; margin-right:10px;float:right;background:#cc9900;' href="https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/stock/listing/low">Bajo (0)</a>
			<a class='button' id='empty' style='margin-top:5px; margin-right:10px;float:right;background:#2d5672;' href="https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/stock/listing">Todos</a>
		</div>
		<div class="block-content">
			<table id="table-list" class="table datatableX">
				<thead>
					<tr>
						<th></th>
						<th>Lote</th>
						<th>Expiración</th>
						<th>Nombre</th>
						<th></th>
						<th></th>
						<th>Cantidad</th>
						<th>Estado</th>
						<th>Acción</th>
					</tr>
				</thead>
				<tbody>
					<tr>
						<td colspan="10">Cargando información</td>
					</tr>
				</tbody>
			</table>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

		</div>
		</div> <!--! end of #main-content -->
  </div> <!--! end of #main -->

	<script type="text/javascript">
		/*
		 * Confirmation Dialog
		 */

		$("body").delegate(".deleteClick","click",function(e) {
		    e.preventDefault();
		    var targetUrl = $(this).attr("href");

		    $("#dialog").dialog({
		      buttons : {
			"Confirmar" : function() {

			  $("#dialog").dialog("close");
			  
			$.ajax({
			  type: 'POST',
			  url: targetUrl,
			  data: {  },
			  beforeSend:function(){
			    // this is where we activate a loading image
			    $('#cargador').css("visibility","visible");
			  },
			  success:function(data){
			    // successful request; do something with the data
			    $('#cargador').css("visibility","hidden");
			    
			$.jGrowl("Registro Borrado", { theme: 'success' });
			$(e.target).closest('tr').children('td').css('background-color','#C34627').delay(500).fadeOut(500);
        
			  },
			  error:function(){
			    // failed request; give feedback to user
			    
            $.jGrowl("No se pudo Borrar el Registro", { theme: 'error' });
        
			  }
			});



			  //$(e.target).closest("tr").children("td").css("background-color","#C34627").delay(500).fadeOut(500);

			  //console.log($(e.target).closest("tr"));
			},
			"Cancelar" : function() {
			  $(this).dialog("close");
			}
		      }
		    });

		    $("#dialog").dialog("open");
		});
	</script>

    

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	$("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").click(function(e){
	// $("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").closest("form").submit(function(e){
		$("#loading").css("display","");
		$("#loading").dialog("open");
		e.preventDefault();
		button = $(this);
		button.attr("disabled", "disabled");
		button.closest("form").submit();
		setTimeout(function(){
			button.removeAttr("disabled");
			$("#loading").dialog("close");
		},6000);
	});

	$(document).delegate(":input:not(textarea):not([type=submit])","keypress",function(e) {
		return e.keyCode != 13;
	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"> 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("#boton_dbug").click(function(){
            $.post("reception/work_order/listing", {dbug: "True"})
            window.location.replace("auth/login");
	});
	
	$("#loading").dialog({
		resizable: false,
		draggable: true,
		autoOpen: false,
		modal: true,
		height: 60,
		maxWidth: 180,
		closeOnEscape: true,
		title: "Procesando...",
		closeText: "hide",
		dialogClass: "no-close"
	  });

});


</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
	$().ready(function() {
		"use strict";

		App.init();
        
		var v = $("#create-user-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset").click(function() { v.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("User was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v2 = $("#write-message-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset2").click(function() { v2.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Message was not sent.", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v3 = $("#create-folder-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset3").click(function() { v3.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Folder was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v4 = $("#create-title-form").validate();


		$("#modal").click(function(e) {
                  $("#"+$(e.target).attr("modal")).modal({
                    opacity:50,
                    overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                    });
                });


		/*
		 * Charts
		 */
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'line', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-line').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'area', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-area').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'pie', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-pie').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'bar', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-bar').trigger('visualizeRefresh');

		$("#specify-a-unique-tab-name").createTabs();
		$("#tab-graph").createTabs();

		$('#slider').sliderNav();

			"sInfo":         " _START_ hasta _END_ de _TOTAL_ registros",

			{ "bVisible": false, "bSearchable": false, "bSortable": false },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "bVisible": false },{ "bVisible": false, "bSearchable": false, "bSortable": false },{ "sClass": "row_table_center", "bSearchable": false, "bSortable": false },{ "sClass": "row_table_center" },{ "sClass": "row_table_center", "bSearchable": false, "bSortable": false }
			],
			'fnRowCallback' : function( row, data ) {
	if(data[7].includes('Bajo')){
		$('td', row).css('background','#fff0b3');
		$('td:eq(4)', row).css('font-weight','900');
	}
	if(data[7].includes('Agotado')){
		$('td', row).css('background','#ffb3b3');
	}
}

* dentro del apartado fonts.googleapis.com se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=PT+Sans
* dentro del apartado fonts.gstatic.com se encuentra la carpeta s/ptsans/v17, y dentro de ésta carpeta se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v17/jizaRExUiTo99u79D0KExQ.woff2

La siguiente opción es: Listado de Tarifarios (Link:https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/products/price_list) y me arroja los siguientes apartados en Sources:
top, dentro de top se encuentra: app24.medicati.com, fonts.googleapis.com y fonts.gstatic.com.
* dentro del apartado app24.medicati.com se encuentra la carpeta mdti/lab, y dentro de esta carpeta se encuentran las carpetas: account_data/sanrafael/system, css, img, js y sanrafael/products.
- dentro de la subcarpeta account_data/sanrafael/system se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/account_data/sanrafael/system/logo_sanrafael_260x98.png
- dentro de la subcarpeta css se encuentra la carpeta fonts y los siguientes archivos:
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/960.fluid.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/application_custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/buttons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/font-awesome.min.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/forms.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/icons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/jquery-ui-1.8.15.custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/lists.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/main.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/notifications.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/style.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/tables.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/typography.css

Te comparto el HTML:

	<script type="text/javascript">
		/*
		 * Confirmation Dialog
		 */

		$("body").delegate(".deleteClick","click",function(e) {
		    e.preventDefault();
		    var targetUrl = $(this).attr("href");

		    $("#dialog").dialog({
		      buttons : {
			"Confirmar" : function() {

			  $("#dialog").dialog("close");
			  
			$.ajax({
			  type: 'POST',
			  url: targetUrl,
			  data: {  },
			  beforeSend:function(){
			    // this is where we activate a loading image
			    $('#cargador').css("visibility","visible");
			  },
			  success:function(data){
			    // successful request; do something with the data
			    $('#cargador').css("visibility","hidden");
			    
                $.jGrowl("Registro Borrado", { theme: 'success' });
            
			  },
			  error:function(){
			    // failed request; give feedback to user
			    
                $.jGrowl("No se pudo Borrar el Registro", { theme: 'error' });
            
			  }
			});



			  //$(e.target).closest("tr").children("td").css("background-color","#C34627").delay(500).fadeOut(500);

			  //console.log($(e.target).closest("tr"));
			},
			"Cancelar" : function() {
			  $(this).dialog("close");
			}
		      }
		    });

		    $("#dialog").dialog("open");
		});
	</script>

    

		<script type="text/javascript">
                    /*
                     * Edit modal script to load form for editing
		     *
                     * Delegate the modal of the update form and shows it as a modal
                     */
                    $("body").delegate(".editClick","click",function(e) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        var targetUrl = $(this).attr("href");
                            $("#bank_acc_container").load(targetUrl);
                            $("#bank_acc_container").modal({
                                opacity:50,
                                position: ["30%","30%"],
                                overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                                ,minWidth: '50%'
                            });
                            //$("#bank-account-form :input[type='text']:first").focus();
                            //$("#account_number").focus();
                            //$("#account_number").focus($.fn.setFocus);
                    });

                    $("body").delegate("#bank_acc_submit","click",function(e) {
                       //$("#bank-account-form").validate();

                         /*
                          * Ajax form post
                          */

                         var bankInsertForm = $("#bank-account-form").validate({

                             submitHandler: function(form) {
                                // some other code
                                // maybe disabling submit button
                                // then:
				

                                 $.ajax({
                                   type: 'POST',
                                   url: $(form).attr('action'),
                                   data: $(form).serialize(),
                                   beforeSend:function(){
                                     // this is where we append a loading image
                                     $('#ajax-panel').html('<div class="loading"><img src="img/mt_icons/loaders/circle.gif" alt="Cargando..." /></div>');
                                   },
                                   success:function(data){
                                     // successful request; do something with the data

                                     $(data).find('item').each(function(i){
                                       $('#ajax-panel').append('<h4>' + $(this).find('title').text() + '</h4><p>' + $(this).find('link').text() + '</p>');
                                     });
                                     if(typeof $.fn.dataTableExt.oApi.fnReloadAjax == 'function') {
		                                 window.dBankAccounts.fnReloadAjax();
		                             }
                                     //alert("Response:");
									 
                                   },
                                   error:function(){
                                     // failed request; give feedback to user

                                     $('#ajax-panel').html('<p class="error"><strong>Oops!</strong> Try that again in a few moments.</p>');
                                     return false;

                                     return false;
                                   }
                                 });
                                 //Close the modal window
                                 //Refresh the corresponding data table
                                 //dBankAccounts.fnClearTable(0);
                                 //dBankAccounts.fnDraw();
                                 $.jGrowl("Registro Agregado", { theme: 'success' });
                                 parent.$.modal.close();
                                 //return false;
                             }
                         });
                         $("#bank_acc_reset").click(function() { bankInsertForm.resetForm(); parent.$.modal.close(); $.jGrowl("No se agregaron datos", { theme: 'error' }); });

                        //dBankAccounts.fnClearTable(0);
                        //dBankAccounts.fnDraw();

                    });

                    $("body").delegate("#bank_acc_reset","click",function(e) {
                        $("#load_bank_acc_form").resetForm(); parent.$.modal.close(); $.jGrowl("No se modificaron datos", { theme: 'error' });
                    });

		</script>


<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	$("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").click(function(e){
	// $("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").closest("form").submit(function(e){
		$("#loading").css("display","");
		$("#loading").dialog("open");
		e.preventDefault();
		button = $(this);
		button.attr("disabled", "disabled");
		button.closest("form").submit();
		setTimeout(function(){
			button.removeAttr("disabled");
			$("#loading").dialog("close");
		},6000);
	});

	$(document).delegate(":input:not(textarea):not([type=submit])","keypress",function(e) {
		return e.keyCode != 13;
	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"> 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("#boton_dbug").click(function(){
            $.post("reception/work_order/listing", {dbug: "True"})
            window.location.replace("auth/login");
	});
	
	$("#loading").dialog({
		resizable: false,
		draggable: true,
		autoOpen: false,
		modal: true,
		height: 60,
		maxWidth: 180,
		closeOnEscape: true,
		title: "Procesando...",
		closeText: "hide",
		dialogClass: "no-close"
	  });

});


</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
	$().ready(function() {
		"use strict";

		App.init();
        
		var v = $("#create-user-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset").click(function() { v.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("User was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v2 = $("#write-message-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset2").click(function() { v2.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Message was not sent.", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v3 = $("#create-folder-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset3").click(function() { v3.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Folder was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v4 = $("#create-title-form").validate();


		$("#modal").click(function(e) {
                  $("#"+$(e.target).attr("modal")).modal({
                    opacity:50,
                    overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                    });
                });


		/*
		 * Charts
		 */
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'line', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-line').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'area', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-area').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'pie', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-pie').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'bar', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-bar').trigger('visualizeRefresh');

		/*
		 * Tabs
		 */
		$("#specify-a-unique-tab-name").createTabs();
		$("#tab-graph").createTabs();

		/*
		 * Contact List
		 */
		$('#slider').sliderNav();


                //## js_docready functions
                
				$.fn.dataTableExt.oApi.fnReloadAjax = function ( oSettings, sNewSource, fnCallback, bStandingRedraw )
				{
					// DataTables 1.10 compatibility - if 1.10 then versionCheck exists.
					// 1.10s API has ajax reloading built in, so we use those abilities
					// directly.
					if ( $.fn.dataTable.versionCheck ) {
						var api = new $.fn.dataTable.Api( oSettings );
				 
						if ( sNewSource ) {
							api.ajax.url( sNewSource ).load( fnCallback, !bStandingRedraw );
						}
						else {
							api.ajax.reload( fnCallback, !bStandingRedraw );
						}
						return;
					}
				 
					if ( sNewSource !== undefined && sNewSource !== null ) {
						oSettings.sAjaxSource = sNewSource;
					}
				 
					// Server-side processing should just call fnDraw
					if ( oSettings.oFeatures.bServerSide ) {
						this.fnDraw();
						return;
					}
				 
					this.oApi._fnProcessingDisplay( oSettings, true );
					var that = this;
					var iStart = oSettings._iDisplayStart;
					var aData = [];
				 
					this.oApi._fnServerParams( oSettings, aData );
				 
					oSettings.fnServerData.call( oSettings.oInstance, oSettings.sAjaxSource, aData, function(json) {
						/* Clear the old information from the table */
						that.oApi._fnClearTable( oSettings );
				 
						/* Got the data - add it to the table */
						var aData =  (oSettings.sAjaxDataProp !== '') ?
							that.oApi._fnGetObjectDataFn( oSettings.sAjaxDataProp )( json ) : json;
				 
						for ( var i=0 ; i<aData.length ; i++ )
						{
							that.oApi._fnAddData( oSettings, aData[i] );
						}
						 
						oSettings.aiDisplay = oSettings.aiDisplayMaster.slice();
				 
						that.fnDraw();
				 
						if ( bStandingRedraw === true )
						{
							oSettings._iDisplayStart = iStart;
							that.oApi._fnCalculateEnd( oSettings );
							that.fnDraw( false );
						}
				 
						that.oApi._fnProcessingDisplay( oSettings, false );
				 
						/* Callback user function - for event handlers etc */
						if ( typeof fnCallback == 'function' && fnCallback !== null )
						{
							fnCallback( oSettings );
						}
					}, oSettings );
				};
		
		/*
		 * DataTables
		 */
		//$('#table-accounts').dataTable();


		window.dBankAccounts = $('#table-accounts').dataTable({
		    "bProcessing": true,
		    "bServerSide": true,
		    "sAjaxSource": "products/ajx_price_list",
		    "sServerMethod": "POST",
		    "sPaginationType": "full_numbers",
		    "bJQueryUI": false,
		    "sDom": '<"top"lf<"clear">>rt<"block-actions"ip>',
		    "aaSorting": [[ 1, "desc" ],[0,"desc"]],// Columna 4 con sort DESC
			"bAutoWidth": false,
		    "oLanguage": {
			"sProcessing":   "Procesando...",
			//"sLengthMenu":   "Mostrar _MENU_ registros",
			"sLengthMenu": 'Display <select class="data_table_list">'+
			             '<option value="10">10</option>'+
			             '<option value="20">20</option>'+
			             '<option value="30">30</option>'+
			             '<option value="40">40</option>'+
			             '<option value="50">50</option>'+
			             '<option value="-1">All</option>'+
			             '</select> records',
			"sZeroRecords":  "No se encontraron resultados",
			"sInfo":         " _START_ hasta _END_ de _TOTAL_ registros",
			"sInfoEmpty":    "0 hasta 0 de 0 registros",
			"sInfoFiltered": "(_MAX_ registros en total)",
			"sInfoPostFix":  "",
			"sSearch":       "Buscar:",
			"sUrl":          "",
			"oPaginate": {
			    "sFirst":    "Primero",
			    "sPrevious": "Anterior",
			    "sNext":     "Siguiente",
			    "sLast":     "Último"
			}
		    },
		    "aoColumns": [
			null,null,{ "sClass": "row_table_center", "bSearchable": false, "bSortable": false }
			],
			
		});

		/*
		 * Confirmation Dialog
		 */
		$("#dialog").dialog({
		  autoOpen: false,
		  modal: true
		});
		
		/*
		 * Basic Form Validate
		 */
		var validateform = $("#validate-form").validate();
                //var validateform = $("#create-account-form").validate();



                //# Cancel Click function
		$("#reset-validate-form").click(function() {
			validateform.resetForm();
			$.jGrowl("Los campos de la forma fueron borrados.", { theme: 'error' });
		});



	});
  </script>
  <!-- end scripts-->

  <!-- Prompt IE 6 users to install Chrome Frame. Remove this if you want to support IE 6.
       chromium.org/developers/how-tos/chrome-frame-getting-started -->
  <!--[if lt IE 7 ]>
    <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/chrome-frame/1.0.3/CFInstall.min.js"></script>
    <script>window.attachEvent('onload',function(){CFInstall.check({mode:'overlay'})})</script>
  <![endif]-->

</body>
</html>


* dentro del apartado fonts.googleapis.com se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=PT+Sans
* dentro del apartado fonts.gstatic.com se encuentra la carpeta s/ptsans/v17, y dentro de ésta carpeta se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v17/jizaRExUiTo99u79D0KExQ.woff2

La siguiente opción es: Cambios de Precios (Link:https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/products/price_changes) y me arroja los siguientes apartados en Sources:
top, dentro de top se encuentra: app24.medicati.com, fonts.googleapis.com y fonts.gstatic.com.
* dentro del apartado app24.medicati.com se encuentra la carpeta mdti/lab, y dentro de esta carpeta se encuentran las carpetas: account_data/sanrafael/system, css, img, js y sanrafael/products.
- dentro de la subcarpeta account_data/sanrafael/system se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/account_data/sanrafael/system/logo_sanrafael_260x98.png
- dentro de la subcarpeta css se encuentra la carpeta fonts y los siguientes archivos:
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/960.fluid.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/application_custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/buttons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/font-awesome.min.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/forms.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/icons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/jquery-ui-1.8.15.custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/lists.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/main.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/notifications.css

	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/typography.css

  <!-- Begin of #container -->
  <div id="container">
  	<!-- Begin of #header -->
    <div id="header-surround" class="hidden-print"><header id="header">

    	<!-- Place your logo here -->
		<img src="../img/mt_icons/app/medicati.png" alt="Grape" class="logo">

		<!-- Divider between info-button and the toolbar-icons -->
		<div class="divider-header divider-vertical"></div>

		<!-- Info-Button -->
		<a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="$('#info-dialog').dialog({ modal: true });"><span class="btn-info"></span></a>

			<!-- Modal Box Content -->
			<div id="info-dialog" title="Acerca De" style="display: none;">
				<p style="text-align: center;">MedicaTI V30.2.103</p>
				<p style="text-align: center;">MedicaTI Ver Date 2025-07-01</p>

	<script type="text/javascript" src="../js/app.js"></script>

  <!-- Bottom Javascripts-->
  <script defer src="../js/mylibs/jquery.jeditable.js"></script> <!-- Editable Script -->

  <script src="../js/mylibs/jquery.chained.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>

  <script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
  $(function() {
    $(document).undelegate(":input:not(textarea):not([type=submit])","keypress");
    /* For jquery.chained.js */
    $("#id_pro_section").chained("#id_pro_area");
    $("#id_pro_category").chained("#id_pro_section");
    
    /* Show Fields after last selector has value. */
    $("#id_pro_category").bind("change", function(event) {
        if ("" != $("option:selected", this).val()) {
            $("#product_code").prop("readonly", false);
            $("#product_code").css("background-color", "#FFF");
            $("#product_description").prop("readonly", false);
            $("#product_description").css("background-color", "#FFF");
        } else {
            $("#product_code").prop("readonly", true);
            $("#product_code").css("background-color", "#ccc");
            $("#product_description").prop("readonly", true);
            $("#product_description").css("background-color", "#ccc");
        }
    });
    if ("" == $("option:selected", $("#id_pro_category")).val()) {
        $("#product_code").prop("readonly", true);
        $("#product_code").css("background-color", "#ccc");
        $("#product_description").prop("readonly", true);
        $("#product_description").css("background-color", "#ccc");
    }

    
  });
  </script>


<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	$("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").click(function(e){
	// $("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").closest("form").submit(function(e){
		$("#loading").css("display","");
		$("#loading").dialog("open");
		e.preventDefault();
		button = $(this);
		button.attr("disabled", "disabled");
		button.closest("form").submit();
		setTimeout(function(){
			button.removeAttr("disabled");
			$("#loading").dialog("close");
		},6000);
	});

	$(document).delegate(":input:not(textarea):not([type=submit])","keypress",function(e) {
		return e.keyCode != 13;
	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"> 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("#boton_dbug").click(function(){
            $.post("reception/work_order/listing", {dbug: "True"})
            window.location.replace("auth/login");
	});
	
	$("#loading").dialog({
		resizable: false,
		draggable: true,
		autoOpen: false,
		modal: true,
		height: 60,
		maxWidth: 180,
		closeOnEscape: true,
		title: "Procesando...",
		closeText: "hide",
		dialogClass: "no-close"
	  });

});


</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
	$().ready(function() {
		"use strict";

		App.init();
        
		var v = $("#create-user-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset").click(function() { v.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("User was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v2 = $("#write-message-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset2").click(function() { v2.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Message was not sent.", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v3 = $("#create-folder-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset3").click(function() { v3.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Folder was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v4 = $("#create-title-form").validate();


		$("#modal").click(function(e) {
                  $("#"+$(e.target).attr("modal")).modal({
                    opacity:50,
                    overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                    });
                });


		/*
		 * Charts
		 */
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'line', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-line').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'area', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-area').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'pie', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-pie').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'bar', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-bar').trigger('visualizeRefresh');

		/*
		 * Tabs
		 */
		$("#specify-a-unique-tab-name").createTabs();
		$("#tab-graph").createTabs();

		/*
		 * Contact List
		 */
		$('#slider').sliderNav();


                //## js_docready functions
                		
		/*
		 * Basic Form Validate
		 */
                //$('.edit').editable('/products/ajx_pro/');
                $('.edit').editable('products/ajx_price_changes', {
                    indicator : 'Guardando...',
                    tooltip   : 'Click para editar...',
                    placeholder: 'Click para Llenar',
                    style   : 'display: inline; max-width:70%;',
                    //event   : 'dblclick',
                    callback : function(value, settings) {
                             //console.log(this);
                             //console.log(value);
                             //console.log(settings);
                             $(this).parent().parent().css('background-color','#E0F2F7');
                         }                    
                });
              
                
	});
  </script>
  <!-- end scripts-->

</body>
</html>


* dentro del apartado fonts.googleapis.com se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=PT+Sans
* dentro del apartado fonts.gstatic.com se encuentra la carpeta s/ptsans/v17, y dentro de ésta carpeta se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v17/jizaRExUiTo99u79D0KExQ.woff2

La siguiente opción es: Grupos de Etiquetas (Link:https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/products/barcode_groups) y me arroja los siguientes apartados en Sources:
top, dentro de top se encuentra: app24.medicati.com, fonts.googleapis.com y fonts.gstatic.com.
* dentro del apartado app24.medicati.com se encuentra la carpeta mdti/lab, y dentro de esta carpeta se encuentran las carpetas: account_data/sanrafael/system, css, img, js y sanrafael/products.
- dentro de la subcarpeta account_data/sanrafael/system se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/account_data/sanrafael/system/logo_sanrafael_260x98.png
- dentro de la subcarpeta css se encuentra la carpeta fonts y los siguientes archivos:
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/960.fluid.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/application_custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/buttons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/font-awesome.min.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/forms.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/icons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/jquery-ui-1.8.15.custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/lists.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/main.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/notifications.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/style.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/tables.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/typography.css
 	- dentro de la subcarpeta fonts se encuentra: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff?v=3.2.1

Te comparto el HTML:

								<label for="subject">Subject</label>
								<input type="text" name="subject">
							</p>

							</div>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		/*
		 * Confirmation Dialog
		 */

		$("body").delegate(".deleteClick","click",function(e) {
		    e.preventDefault();
		    var targetUrl = $(this).attr("href");

		    $("#dialog").dialog({
		      buttons : {
			"Confirmar" : function() {

			  $("#dialog").dialog("close");
			  
			$.ajax({
			  type: 'POST',
			  url: targetUrl,
			  data: {  },
			  beforeSend:function(){
			    // this is where we activate a loading image
			    $('#cargador').css("visibility","visible");
			  },
			  success:function(data){
			    // successful request; do something with the data
			    $('#cargador').css("visibility","hidden");
			    
                $.jGrowl("Registro Borrado", { theme: 'success' });
            
			  },
			  error:function(){
			    // failed request; give feedback to user
			    
                $.jGrowl("No se pudo Borrar el Registro", { theme: 'error' });
            
			  }
			});



			  //$(e.target).closest("tr").children("td").css("background-color","#C34627").delay(500).fadeOut(500);

			  //console.log($(e.target).closest("tr"));
			},
			"Cancelar" : function() {
			  $(this).dialog("close");
			}
		      }
		    });

		    $("#dialog").dialog("open");
		});
	</script>

    

		<script type="text/javascript">
                    /*
                     * Edit modal script to load form for editing
		     *
                     * Delegate the modal of the update form and shows it as a modal
                     */
                    $("body").delegate(".editClick","click",function(e) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        var targetUrl = $(this).attr("href");
                            $("#bank_acc_container").load(targetUrl);
                            $("#bank_acc_container").modal({
                                opacity:50,
                                position: ["30%","30%"],
                                overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                                
                            });
                            //$("#bank-account-form :input[type='text']:first").focus();
                            //$("#account_number").focus();
                            //$("#account_number").focus($.fn.setFocus);
                    });

                    $("body").delegate("#bank_acc_submit","click",function(e) {
                       //$("#bank-account-form").validate();

                         /*
                          * Ajax form post
                          */

                         var bankInsertForm = $("#bank-account-form").validate({

                             submitHandler: function(form) {
                                // some other code
                                // maybe disabling submit button
                                // then:
				

                                 $.ajax({
                                   type: 'POST',
                                   url: $(form).attr('action'),
                                   data: $(form).serialize(),
                                   beforeSend:function(){
                                     // this is where we append a loading image
                                     $('#ajax-panel').html('<div class="loading"><img src="img/mt_icons/loaders/circle.gif" alt="Cargando..." /></div>');
                                   },
                                   success:function(data){
                                     // successful request; do something with the data

                                     $(data).find('item').each(function(i){
                                       $('#ajax-panel').append('<h4>' + $(this).find('title').text() + '</h4><p>' + $(this).find('link').text() + '</p>');
                                     });
                                     if(typeof $.fn.dataTableExt.oApi.fnReloadAjax == 'function') {
		                                 window.dBankAccounts.fnReloadAjax();
		                             }
                                     //alert("Response:");
									 
                                   },
                                   error:function(){
                                     // failed request; give feedback to user

                                     $('#ajax-panel').html('<p class="error"><strong>Oops!</strong> Try that again in a few moments.</p>');
                                     return false;

                                     return false;
                                   }
                                 });
                                 //Close the modal window
                                 //Refresh the corresponding data table
                                 //dBankAccounts.fnClearTable(0);
                                 //dBankAccounts.fnDraw();
                                 $.jGrowl("Registro Agregado", { theme: 'success' });
                                 parent.$.modal.close();
                                 //return false;
                             }
                         });
                         $("#bank_acc_reset").click(function() { bankInsertForm.resetForm(); parent.$.modal.close(); $.jGrowl("No se agregaron datos", { theme: 'error' }); });

                        //dBankAccounts.fnClearTable(0);
                        //dBankAccounts.fnDraw();

                    });

                    $("body").delegate("#bank_acc_reset","click",function(e) {
                        $("#load_bank_acc_form").resetForm(); parent.$.modal.close(); $.jGrowl("No se modificaron datos", { theme: 'error' });
                    });

		</script>


<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	$("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").click(function(e){
	// $("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").closest("form").submit(function(e){
		$("#loading").css("display","");
		$("#loading").dialog("open");
		e.preventDefault();
		button = $(this);
		button.attr("disabled", "disabled");
		button.closest("form").submit();
		setTimeout(function(){
			button.removeAttr("disabled");
			$("#loading").dialog("close");
		},6000);
	});

	$(document).delegate(":input:not(textarea):not([type=submit])","keypress",function(e) {
		return e.keyCode != 13;
	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"> 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("#boton_dbug").click(function(){
            $.post("reception/work_order/listing", {dbug: "True"})
            window.location.replace("auth/login");
	});
	
	$("#loading").dialog({
		resizable: false,
		draggable: true,
		autoOpen: false,
		modal: true,
		height: 60,
		maxWidth: 180,
		closeOnEscape: true,
		title: "Procesando...",
		closeText: "hide",
		dialogClass: "no-close"
	  });

});


</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
	$().ready(function() {
		"use strict";

		App.init();
        
		var v = $("#create-user-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset").click(function() { v.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("User was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v2 = $("#write-message-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset2").click(function() { v2.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Message was not sent.", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v3 = $("#create-folder-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset3").click(function() { v3.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Folder was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v4 = $("#create-title-form").validate();


		$("#modal").click(function(e) {
                  $("#"+$(e.target).attr("modal")).modal({
                    opacity:50,
                    overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                    });
                });


		/*
		 * Charts
		 */
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'line', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-line').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'area', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-area').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'pie', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-pie').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'bar', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-bar').trigger('visualizeRefresh');

		/*
		 * Tabs
		 */
		$("#specify-a-unique-tab-name").createTabs();
		$("#tab-graph").createTabs();

		/*
		 * Contact List
		 */
		$('#slider').sliderNav();


                //## js_docready functions
                
		/*
		 * DataTables
		 */
		//$('#table-accounts').dataTable();


		window.dBankAccounts = $('#table-accounts').dataTable({
		    "bProcessing": true,
		    "bServerSide": true,
		    "sAjaxSource": "products/ajx_barcode_groups_list",
		    "sServerMethod": "POST",
		    "sPaginationType": "full_numbers",
		    "bJQueryUI": false,
		    "sDom": '<"top"lf<"clear">>rt<"block-actions"ip>',
		    "aaSorting": [[ 1, "desc" ],[0,"desc"]],// Columna 4 con sort DESC
			"bAutoWidth": false,
		    "oLanguage": {
			"sProcessing":   "Procesando...",
			//"sLengthMenu":   "Mostrar _MENU_ registros",
			"sLengthMenu": 'Display <select class="data_table_list">'+
			             '<option value="10">10</option>'+
			             '<option value="20">20</option>'+
			             '<option value="30">30</option>'+
			             '<option value="40">40</option>'+
			             '<option value="50">50</option>'+
			             '<option value="-1">All</option>'+
			             '</select> records',
			"sZeroRecords":  "No se encontraron resultados",
			"sInfo":         " _START_ hasta _END_ de _TOTAL_ registros",
			"sInfoEmpty":    "0 hasta 0 de 0 registros",
			"sInfoFiltered": "(_MAX_ registros en total)",
			"sInfoPostFix":  "",
			"sSearch":       "Buscar:",
			"sUrl":          "",
			"oPaginate": {
			    "sFirst":    "Primero",
			    "sPrevious": "Anterior",
			    "sNext":     "Siguiente",
			    "sLast":     "Último"
			}
		    },
		    "aoColumns": [
			null,null,{ "sClass": "row_table_center", "bSearchable": false, "bSortable": false }
			],
			
		});

		/*
		 * Confirmation Dialog
		 */
		$("#dialog").dialog({
		  autoOpen: false,
		  modal: true
		});
		
		/*
		 * Basic Form Validate
		 */
		var validateform = $("#validate-form").validate();
                //var validateform = $("#create-account-form").validate();



                //# Cancel Click function
		$("#reset-validate-form").click(function() {
			validateform.resetForm();
			$.jGrowl("Los campos de la forma fueron borrados.", { theme: 'error' });
		});



	});
  </script>
  <!-- end scripts-->

  <!-- Prompt IE 6 users to install Chrome Frame. Remove this if you want to support IE 6.
       chromium.org/developers/how-tos/chrome-frame-getting-started -->
  <!--[if lt IE 7 ]>
    <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/chrome-frame/1.0.3/CFInstall.min.js"></script>
    <script>window.attachEvent('onload',function(){CFInstall.check({mode:'overlay'})})</script>
  <![endif]-->

</body>
</html>

* dentro del apartado fonts.googleapis.com se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=PT+Sans
* dentro del apartado fonts.gstatic.com se encuentra la carpeta s/ptsans/v17, y dentro de ésta carpeta se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v17/jizaRExUiTo99u79D0KExQ.woff2


8.- Administración 
La única opción es: Usuarios (Link:https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/users/admin/listing) y me arroja los siguientes apartados en Sources:
top, dentro de top se encuentra: app24.medicati.com, fonts.googleapis.com y fonts.gstatic.com.
* dentro del apartado app24.medicati.com se encuentra la carpeta mdti/lab, y dentro de esta carpeta se encuentran las carpetas: account_data/sanrafael/system, css, img, js y sanrafael/users/admin.
- dentro de la subcarpeta account_data/sanrafael/system se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/account_data/sanrafael/system/logo_sanrafael_260x98.png
- dentro de la subcarpeta css se encuentra la carpeta fonts y los siguientes archivos:
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/960.fluid.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/application_custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/buttons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/font-awesome.min.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/forms.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/icons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/jquery-ui-1.8.15.custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/lists.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/main.css

	<script type="text/javascript">
		/*
		 * Confirmation Dialog
		 */

		$("body").delegate(".confirmLink","click",function(e) {
		    e.preventDefault();
		    var targetUrl = $(this).attr("href");

		    $("#dialog").dialog({
		      buttons : {
			"Confirmar" : function() {

			  $("#dialog").dialog("close");
			  
			$.ajax({
			  type: 'POST',
			  url: targetUrl,
			  data: {  },
			  beforeSend:function(){
			    // this is where we activate a loading image
			    $('#cargador').css("visibility","visible");
			  },
			  success:function(data){
			    // successful request; do something with the data
			    $('#cargador').css("visibility","hidden");
			    
				$.jGrowl("Registro Borrado", { theme: 'success' });
			
			  },
			  error:function(){
			    // failed request; give feedback to user
			    
				$.jGrowl("No se pudo Borrar el Registro", { theme: 'error' });
			
			  }
			});

		window.dTables._fnReDraw();
		


			  //$(e.target).closest("tr").children("td").css("background-color","#C34627").delay(500).fadeOut(500);

			  //console.log($(e.target).closest("tr"));
			},
			"Cancelar" : function() {
			  $(this).dialog("close");
			}
		      }
		    });

		    $("#dialog").dialog("open");
		});
	</script>

    

		<script type='text/javascript' charset='utf-8'>
			$('body').delegate('.confirmClick','click',function(e) {
				e.preventDefault();
				var self = $(this);

				$('#dialogSuspend').dialog({
					buttons : {
						'Confirmar' : function() {
							$('#dialogSuspend').dialog('close');
							
							$.ajax({
								type: 'POST',
								url: $(self).attr('href'),
								data: {'uacc_suspend':($(self).data('suspended')?1:0)},
								beforeSend:function(){},
								success:function(data){
									if(data.status=='success'){
										$('#cargador').css('visibility','hidden');
										window.dTables._fnReDraw();
									}
									$.jGrowl(data.result_msg, { theme: data.status });
								},
								error:function(){
									$.jGrowl('No hay conexion', { theme: 'error' });
								}
							});
						},
						'Cancelar' : function() {
							$(this).dialog('close');
						}
					}
				});
				if( $(this).data('suspended') ){
					$('#dialogSuspend').html( $('#dialogSuspend').html().replace('activar','suspender') )
				}else{
					$('#dialogSuspend').html( $('#dialogSuspend').html().replace('suspender','activar') )
				}
				$('#dialogSuspend').dialog('open');
			});
		</script>
	

	<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	$("body").delegate("#insertUser", "click", function(e){
		e.preventDefault();
		var self = $(this);

		$("#dialogUsers").dialog({
			buttons: {
				"Entendido": function() {
					$("#dialogUsers").dialog("close");
				}
			}
		});
		$("#dialogUsers").dialog("open");
	});
	</script>
	

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	$("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").click(function(e){
	// $("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").closest("form").submit(function(e){
		$("#loading").css("display","");
		$("#loading").dialog("open");
		e.preventDefault();
		button = $(this);
		button.attr("disabled", "disabled");
		button.closest("form").submit();
		setTimeout(function(){
			button.removeAttr("disabled");
			$("#loading").dialog("close");
		},6000);
	});

	$(document).delegate(":input:not(textarea):not([type=submit])","keypress",function(e) {
		return e.keyCode != 13;
	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"> 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("#boton_dbug").click(function(){
            $.post("reception/work_order/listing", {dbug: "True"})
            window.location.replace("auth/login");
	});
	
	$("#loading").dialog({
		resizable: false,
		draggable: true,
		autoOpen: false,
		modal: true,
		height: 60,
		maxWidth: 180,
		closeOnEscape: true,
		title: "Procesando...",
		closeText: "hide",
		dialogClass: "no-close"
	  });

});


</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
	$().ready(function() {
		"use strict";

		App.init();
        
		var v = $("#create-user-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset").click(function() { v.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("User was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v2 = $("#write-message-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset2").click(function() { v2.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Message was not sent.", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v3 = $("#create-folder-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset3").click(function() { v3.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Folder was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v4 = $("#create-title-form").validate();


		$("#modal").click(function(e) {
                  $("#"+$(e.target).attr("modal")).modal({
                    opacity:50,
                    overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                    });
                });


		/*
		 * Charts
		 */
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'line', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-line').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'area', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-area').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'pie', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-pie').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'bar', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-bar').trigger('visualizeRefresh');

		$("#specify-a-unique-tab-name").createTabs();

		$('#slider').sliderNav();

			"sProcessing":   "Procesando...",
			//"sLengthMenu":   "Mostrar _MENU_ registros",

			             '<option value="10">10</option>'+
			             '<option value="20">20</option>'+

			             '<option value="50">50</option>'+
			             '<option value="-1">All</option>'+
			             '</select> records',
			"sZeroRecords":  "No se encontraron resultados",
			"sInfo":         " _START_ hasta _END_ de _TOTAL_ registros",

			    "sFirst":    "Primero",

</body>
</html>

* dentro del apartado fonts.googleapis.com se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=PT+Sans
* dentro del apartado fonts.gstatic.com se encuentra la carpeta s/ptsans/v17, y dentro de ésta carpeta se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v17/jizaRExUiTo99u79D0KExQ.woff2


9.- Reportes 
La primera opción es: Reportes de Órdenes (Link:https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/reports/work_orders) y me arroja los siguientes apartados en Sources:
top, dentro de top se encuentra: app24.medicati.com, fonts.googleapis.com y fonts.gstatic.com.
* dentro del apartado app24.medicati.com se encuentra la carpeta mdti/lab, y dentro de esta carpeta se encuentran las carpetas: account_data/sanrafael/system, css, img, js y sanrafael/reports.
- dentro de la subcarpeta account_data/sanrafael/system se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/account_data/sanrafael/system/logo_sanrafael_260x98.png
- dentro de la subcarpeta css se encuentra la carpeta fonts y los siguientes archivos:

  <script src="../js/mylibs/jquery.ui.timepicker.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
		$(".togglebtn").click(function () {
			var divname= this.value;
			$("#"+divname).slideToggle();
		});
	</script>


		<script type="text/javascript">
			$("#spreadsheet").click(function(e){
				e.preventDefault();
				oldAction = $("#validate-form").attr("action");
				$("#validate-form").attr("action",$(this).attr("href"));
				$("#validate-form").submit();
				$("#validate-form").attr("action",oldAction);
			});
		</script>
	

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	$("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").click(function(e){
	// $("#submit_btn, #btn_submit").closest("form").submit(function(e){
		$("#loading").css("display","");
		$("#loading").dialog("open");
		e.preventDefault();
		button = $(this);
		button.attr("disabled", "disabled");
		button.closest("form").submit();
		setTimeout(function(){
			button.removeAttr("disabled");
			$("#loading").dialog("close");
		},6000);
	});

	$(document).delegate(":input:not(textarea):not([type=submit])","keypress",function(e) {
		return e.keyCode != 13;
	});
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"> 
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("#boton_dbug").click(function(){
            $.post("reception/work_order/listing", {dbug: "True"})
            window.location.replace("auth/login");
	});
	
	$("#loading").dialog({
		resizable: false,
		draggable: true,
		autoOpen: false,
		modal: true,
		height: 60,
		maxWidth: 180,
		closeOnEscape: true,
		title: "Procesando...",
		closeText: "hide",
		dialogClass: "no-close"
	  });

});


</script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
	$().ready(function() {
		"use strict";

		App.init();
        
		var v = $("#create-user-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset").click(function() { v.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("User was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v2 = $("#write-message-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset2").click(function() { v2.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Message was not sent.", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v3 = $("#create-folder-form").validate();
		jQuery("#reset3").click(function() { v3.resetForm(); $.jGrowl("Folder was not created!", { theme: 'error' }); });

		var v4 = $("#create-title-form").validate();


		$("#modal").click(function(e) {
                  $("#"+$(e.target).attr("modal")).modal({
                    opacity:50,
                    overlayCss: {backgroundColor:"#666666"}
                    });
                });


		/*
		 * Charts
		 */
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'line', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-line').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'area', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-area').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'pie', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-pie').trigger('visualizeRefresh');
		$('#graph-data').visualize({type: 'bar', height: 250}).appendTo('#tab-bar').trigger('visualizeRefresh');

		/*
		 * Tabs
		 */
		$("#specify-a-unique-tab-name").createTabs();
		$("#tab-graph").createTabs();

		/*
		 * Contact List
		 */
		$('#slider').sliderNav();


                //## js_docready functions
                
	/*
	 * Datepicker
	 */

	$('#date_from').datepicker(
		{
			dateFormat: 'dd/mm/yy',
			changeMonth: true,
			firstDay: 1,
			changeYear: true,
			numberOfMonths: 1,
			dayNamesMin: ['Do','Lu','Ma','Mi','Ju','Vi','Sa'],
			monthNames: [
				'Enero','Febrero','Marzo','Abril','Mayo',
				'Junio', 'Julio', 'Agosto', 'Septiembre',
				'Octubre', 'Noviembre', 'Diciembre'
			],
			monthNamesShort: [
				'Ene','Feb','Mar','Abr',
				'May','Jun','Jul','Ago',
				'Sep','Oct','Nov','Dic'
			],
			onClose: function( selectedDate ) {
				$('#date_to').datepicker('option','minDate',selectedDate);
				$('#rep_ex_date_to').datepicker('option','minDate',selectedDate);
			}
		}
	);

	$('input.timepicker').timepicker({
		minuteText: 'Minuto',
		hourText: 'Hora',
	});

	$('#date_to').datepicker(
		{
			dateFormat: 'dd/mm/yy',
			changeMonth: true,
			firstDay: 1,
			changeYear: true,
			numberOfMonths: 1,
			dayNamesMin: ['Do','Lu','Ma','Mi','Ju','Vi','Sa'],
			monthNames: [
				'Enero','Febrero','Marzo','Abril','Mayo',
				'Junio', 'Julio', 'Agosto', 'Septiembre',
				'Octubre', 'Noviembre', 'Diciembre'
			],
			monthNamesShort: [
				'Ene','Feb','Mar','Abr',
				'May','Jun','Jul','Ago',
				'Sep','Oct','Nov','Dic'
			],
			onClose: function(selectedDate) {
				$('#date_from').datepicker('option','maxDate',selectedDate);
			}
		}
	);

	$('#products').autocomplete(
		{
			source:
				function(request, response) {
					$.ajax(
						{
							url: 'reports/ajx_autocomplete_products/',
							dataType: 'json',
							data: {
								term : request.term,
								id_pro_category: $('#id_pro_category').val()
							},
							success: function(data) {
								response(data);
							}
						}
					);
			},
			minLength: 2,
			select: function( event, ui ) {
				if(ui.item.extras) {
					var fields = ui.item.extras.split('|');
					$('#id_pro_products').val(fields[0]);
				}
			}
		}
	);

	$('#products').blur(
		function(){
			if(this.value=='Todos') {
				$('#id_pro_products').val('');
			}
		}
	);

	});
  </script>
  <!-- end scripts-->

</html>


* dentro del apartado fonts.googleapis.com se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=PT+Sans
* dentro del apartado fonts.gstatic.com se encuentra la carpeta s/ptsans/v17, y dentro de ésta carpeta se encuentra el archivo: https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/ptsans/v17/jizaRExUiTo99u79D0KExQ.woff2


La siguiente opción es: Reportes de Conceptos (Link:https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/sanrafael/reports/products) y me arroja los siguientes apartados en Sources:
top, dentro de top se encuentra: app24.medicati.com, fonts.googleapis.com y fonts.gstatic.com.
* dentro del apartado app24.medicati.com se encuentra la carpeta mdti/lab, y dentro de esta carpeta se encuentran las carpetas: account_data/sanrafael/system, css, img, js y sanrafael/reports.
- dentro de la subcarpeta account_data/sanrafael/system se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/account_data/sanrafael/system/logo_sanrafael_260x98.png
- dentro de la subcarpeta css se encuentra la carpeta fonts y los siguientes archivos:
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/960.fluid.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/application_custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/buttons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/font-awesome.min.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/forms.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/icons.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/jquery-ui-1.8.15.custom.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/lists.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/main.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/notifications.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/style.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/tables.css
	* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/typography.css
 	- dentro de la subcarpeta fonts se encuentra: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/css/fonts/fontawesome-webfont.woff?v=3.2.1
- dentro de la subcarpeta img se encuentran las carpetas: buttons, container, icons, jquery-ui, misc y mt_icons.
	* dentro de la subcarpeta buttons se encuentra los siguientes archivos:
	 - https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/img/buttons/button-blue.png
	 - https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/img/buttons/button-red.png
	* dentro de la subcarpeta container se encuentran las carpetas: block, footer, header, login-details, main, navigation y title-bar.
		- dentro de la subcarpeta block se encuentran los archivos:
			* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/img/container/block/block-actions-bg.png

		- dentro de la subcarpeta title-bar se encuentra el archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/img/container/title-bar/title-bar-bg.png
	* dentro de la subcarpeta icons se encuentran las carpetas misc y toolbox/20x20
		- dentro de la subcarpeta misc se encuentra:
			* https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/img/icons/misc/arrow-down.png

		- https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/img/jquery-ui/ui-bg_flat_75_ffffff_40x100.png

	* dentro de la subcarpeta mt_icons se encuentran las carpetas: admin, app, company, emr, lab, medical, products, reception_desk, reports y suppliers. También se encuentra el siguiente archivo: https://app24.medicati.com/mdti/lab/img/mt_icons/30.gif

Te comparto el HTML:
